pr_title: Disable 2 more instances of jmxremote param, #1445

timeline.message: fix for 1445, replaceregexp 2 more instances of jmxremote param for karaf v4.2.7

timeline.bodyText:
This is specifically excluded in Opencast. So, this change has no effect at all.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                              <replaceregexp file="target/assembly/bin/karaf.bat" match="-Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote" replace="" byline="true"/>
timeline.author: lkiesow
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -129,8 +129,10 @@
               <phase>prepare-package</phase>
               <configuration>
                 <target>
-                  <!-- Make sure to deactivate JMX by default -->
+                  <!-- Make sure to deactivate JMX by default, comment out these three lines to enable JMX from the build -->
                   <replaceregexp file="target/assembly/bin/karaf" match="-Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote" replace="" byline="true"/>
+                  <replaceregexp file="target/assembly/bin/karaf.bat" match="-Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote" replace="" byline="true"/>

replies.bodyText: Oh, I could have committed the change right from your comment! That's cool. I'll do that next time.
replies.author: karendolan

timeline.message: remove unnecessary repace regex from pull
